import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import "./Products.css" const Products = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]) const fetchProducts = async () => { const response = await fetch("https://fakestoreapi.com/products") const data = await response.json() setProducts(data) } useEffect(() => { fetchProducts() }, []) console.log(products) return (

Our Products

$500 $799
Add To Cart View
) } export default Products
